alert.note: Alert for Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 9:28AM EST until January 03 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Greenville Mountains, Oconee Mountains and Pickens Mountains Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts have peaked and will slowly diminish through throughout the afternoon.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains
